mapper.select: -- retrieveCntBizSearchList 과제건수 사업부별 과제 관리 select dbo.fn_getComDtlNm('BIZ_DPT_CD', a.BIZ_DPT_CD) as bizNm ,a.BIZ_DPT_CD ,isnull(case when a.PGS_STEP_CD = 'PG' and left(a.TSS_STRT_DD, 4) = left(#{searchMonth},4) then count(a.PGS_STEP_CD) end, 0) as tssPlCnt ,isnull(case when a.PGS_STEP_CD = 'PG' or (a.PGS_STEP_CD = 'CM' and a.TSS_ST != '104') then count(a.PGS_STEP_CD) end, 0) as tssPgCnt ,isnull(case when a.PGS_STEP_CD = 'CM' and a.TSS_ST = '104' then count(a.PGS_STEP_CD) end, 0) as tssCmCnt ,isnull(case when a.PGS_STEP_CD = 'PG' and left(a.TSS_FNH_DD, 4) < left(#{searchMonth},4) then count(a.PGS_STEP_CD) end, 0) as tssDlCnt ,count(a.PGS_STEP_CD) as tssTot from IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST a where a.tss_scn_cd ='M' and #{searchMonth} between left(a.TSS_STRT_DD, 7) and left(a.TSS_FNH_DD,7) and tss_cd in (SELECT TSS_CD FROM (SELECT PK_WBS_CD, TSS_CD, STEPRANK , RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY X.PK_WBS_CD ORDER BY X.STEPRANK ASC, TSS_CD DESC) AS OVER_STEP_RANK FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN PGS_STEP_CD = 'CM' THEN 1 WHEN PGS_STEP_CD = 'PG' AND TSS_ST = '100' THEN 2 WHEN PGS_STEP_CD = 'PG' AND (TSS_ST = '101' OR TSS_ST = '102' OR TSS_ST = '301' OR TSS_ST = '302' ) THEN 3 WHEN PGS_STEP_CD = 'PG' AND TSS_ST != '100' THEN 4 END AS STEPRANK , TSS_CD, PGS_STEP_CD, TSS_ST, PK_WBS_CD FROM IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST where tss_scn_cd ='M' and pgs_step_cd <> 'PL' ) X) Y WHERE OVER_STEP_RANK = 1 ) group by a.BIZ_DPT_CD,a.PGS_STEP_CD,a.TSS_STRT_DD ,a.TSS_FNH_DD ,a.TSS_ST

-- retrieveCntTeamSearchList 과제건수 팀별 과제 관리 select m.teamNm ,sum(m.tssPlCnt) as tssPlCnt ,sum(m.tssPgCnt) as tssPgCnt ,sum(m.tssCmCnt) as tssCmCnt ,sum(m.tssDlCnt) as tssDlCnt from ( select (select prj_nm from iris_prj_rsst_mst where prj_cd = a.PRJ_CD) as teamNm ,a.prj_cd ,isnull(case when a.PGS_STEP_CD = 'PG' and left(a.TSS_STRT_DD, 4) = left(#{searchMonth},4) then count(a.PGS_STEP_CD) end, 0) as tssPlCnt ,isnull(case when a.PGS_STEP_CD = 'PG' or (a.PGS_STEP_CD = 'CM' and a.TSS_ST != '104') then count(a.PGS_STEP_CD) end, 0) as tssPgCnt ,isnull(case when a.PGS_STEP_CD = 'CM' and a.TSS_ST = '104' then count(a.PGS_STEP_CD) end, 0) as tssCmCnt ,isnull(case when a.PGS_STEP_CD = 'PG' and left(a.TSS_FNH_DD, 4) < left(#{searchMonth},4) then count(a.PGS_STEP_CD) end, 0) as tssDlCnt ,count(a.PGS_STEP_CD) as tssTot from IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST a where a.tss_scn_cd ='M' and #{searchMonth} between left(a.TSS_STRT_DD, 7) and left(a.TSS_FNH_DD,7) and tss_cd in (SELECT TSS_CD FROM (SELECT PK_WBS_CD, TSS_CD, STEPRANK , RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY X.PK_WBS_CD ORDER BY X.STEPRANK ASC, TSS_CD DESC) AS OVER_STEP_RANK FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN PGS_STEP_CD = 'CM' THEN 1 WHEN PGS_STEP_CD = 'PG' AND TSS_ST = '100' THEN 2 WHEN PGS_STEP_CD = 'PG' AND (TSS_ST = '101' OR TSS_ST = '102' OR TSS_ST = '301' OR TSS_ST = '302' ) THEN 3 WHEN PGS_STEP_CD = 'PG' AND TSS_ST != '100' THEN 4 END AS STEPRANK , TSS_CD, PGS_STEP_CD, TSS_ST, PK_WBS_CD FROM IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST where tss_scn_cd ='M' and pgs_step_cd <> 'PL' ) X) Y WHERE OVER_STEP_RANK = 1 ) group by a.prj_cd,a.PGS_STEP_CD,a.TSS_STRT_DD ,a.TSS_FNH_DD ,a.TSS_ST ) m group by m.teamNm

-- retrievePgsBizSearchList 과제진행현황 사업부별 관리 select dbo.fn_getComDtlNm('BIZ_DPT_CD', a.BIZ_DPT_CD) as bizNm ,a.BIZ_DPT_CD ,isnull(case when c.MK_ST_CD = 'RED' then count(c.MK_ST_CD) end, 0) as red ,isnull(case when c.MK_ST_CD = 'GRN' then count(c.MK_ST_CD) end, 0) as grn ,isnull(case when c.MK_ST_CD = 'YEL' then count(c.MK_ST_CD) end, 0) as yel ,count(c.MK_ST_CD) as tot from IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST a inner join IRIS_PRJ_RSST_MST b on b.prj_cd = a.prj_cd inner join IRIS_MK_INNO_CLS c on a.tss_cd = c.tss_cd and c.CLS_YYMM = #{searchMonth} where a.tss_scn_cd ='M' group by a.BIZ_DPT_CD, c.MK_ST_CD

-- retrievePgsTeamSearchList 과제진행현황 팀별 관리 select m.teamNm ,sum(m.red) as red ,sum(m.grn) as grn ,sum(m.yel) as yel ,sum(m.tot) as tot
from ( select (select prj_nm from iris_prj_rsst_mst where prj_cd = a.PRJ_CD) as teamNm ,a.prj_cd ,isnull(case when c.MK_ST_CD = 'RED' then count(c.MK_ST_CD) end, 0) as red ,isnull(case when c.MK_ST_CD = 'GRN' then count(c.MK_ST_CD) end, 0) as grn ,isnull(case when c.MK_ST_CD = 'YEL' then count(c.MK_ST_CD) end, 0) as yel ,count(c.MK_ST_CD) as tot from IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST a inner join IRIS_PRJ_RSST_MST b on b.prj_cd = a.prj_cd inner join IRIS_MK_INNO_CLS c on a.tss_cd = c.tss_cd and c.CLS_YYMM = #{searchMonth} where tss_scn_cd ='M' group by a.prj_cd, c.MK_ST_CD ) m group by m.teamNm
